name: Moon Police!
description:
Please support the game, so a longer, better version can be created!!

Controls: WASD to move, click to shoot, ‘N’ to respawn (“travel back in time”)

Story:

In the year 2050, humans colonized the moon.
But the moon's power divided us in 2...
Some humans became powerful zombies...
The rest of us gained the ability to  travel back in time...
We built a base on the moon but they quickly took over…
We fight them by creating "time copies" of ourselves.

Credits:

  • Level tileset by Hyptosis: https://hyptosis.itch.io/72x72-fantasy-tech-tileset
  • Characters and other art from the “Top Down Shooter” asset pack by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/topdown-shooter
  • Level music is “Espionage” by Brandon Morris (HaelDB on OpenGameArt): https://opengameart.org/content/espionage
  • Boss music is “Boss Battle #2” by nene: https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-2-symphonic-metal
